reviewText: The DVD has some great points in discussing the 3-5-2 system of play, but only a few.  Mostly it's a closeup of a Brazilian coach(?) speaking in dubbed English, which is ok, except he doesn't really say much.  The rest of it was some primitive animation to show the few points being made about the topic.  It was a case of using the word "Brazil" to make a sale.  And it certainly worked for me.  It won't work again.
